pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyLaunches_A python packages to get information form upcoming space launches._## Install```bashpython3 -m pip install pylaunches```### Example usage```python"""Example usage of pylaunches."""import asynciofrom pylaunches import PyLaunches, PyLaunchesExceptionasync def example(): """Example usage of pylaunches.""" async with PyLaunches() as api: try: launches = await api.upcoming_launches() for launch in launches: print(launch.name) except PyLaunchesException: print(":(")asyncio.get_event_loop().run_until_complete(example())```This package is using the [Launch Library 2 API][launchlibrary] to get the information.[launchlibrary]: https://thespacedevs.com/llapi
